document_data.name: Choker
document_data.mainbody: A '''choker''' was a decorative clothing accessory similar to a [[necklace]], [[torc]], [[collar]] or [[Gorget (jewelry)|gorget]] worn upon the neck.
document_data.Description: Chokers were often made of a strip or ribbon of fine [[fabric]] like [[silk]], or [[leather]], but could also be comprised of fine [[chain]]s or segments of [[metal]] such as [[gold]], and more elaborate ones could be accentuated with precious [[gem]]s or [[pearl]]s.
document_data.Notable Chokers:
* The ''[[apocalypse choker]]'' was a mysterious fashion accessory tied to [[Barovia]].
* The ''[[band of denial]]'' was a black [[silk]] ribbon that could be worn as a choker, [[garter]], [[headband]], or [[belt]], that both blocked the wearer from using [[magic]] and protected them from many effects.
* The ''[[choker of eloquence]]'', a kind of necklace that benefited all speaking and singing the wearer performed.
* The ''[[choker of legerdemain]]'' was a tiny necklace made for [[sprite]]s.
* ''[[Mirabel's pendant]]'', a [[cameo]]-bearing choker worn by the [[Red Wizard]] [[Mirabel]].
* The ''[[necklace of inflection]]'' was a gold choker with an [[emerald]], which aided in translating and imitating speech.{{Cite dragon/316/Cloak and Dagger|45}}
* The ''[[Song Dragon's Choker]]'', a relic that allowed a [[dragon]] to ignore the effects of [[Waterdeep]]'s ''[[Ahghairon's dragonward|dragonward]]''.
* The ''[[starshard choker]]'' was a [[fey]] artifact found in the [[Vault of Stars]].
* The ''[[Stone of Earth]]'', a [[fey]]-touched defensive accessory.
* ''[[Symrustar's choker]]'' was a set of three entwined [[platinum]] chains set with gemstones, worn by the [[elf]] [[mage]] [[Symrustar Auglamyr]], which could be used as a [[spellbook]] of sorts.
* ''[[Vermissa's choker]]'', an [[electrum]] device that functioned similarly to a ''[[helm of telepathy]]''.
* The ''[[web choker]]'', a fashionable and useful [[drow]] accessory that imitated the ''[[web]]'' spell.
document_data.Users:
[[File:Incubus-5e.jpg|thumb|right|300px|''While most fiends were slaves to darkness, [[incubi]] were often slaves to fashion.'']]
* [[Loviatan]] priests often wore black choker-like gorgets as part of their religious vestments, along with particular [[gloves]], [[boots]], and other accessories.
* The elf wizard [[Sharaera Duthtue]] wore a throat-ribbon choker that attached a secret [[dagger]], hidden at the back of her neck under her hair.
* The [[vampiric]] [[smoke drake]] [[Capnolithyl]] wore a special choker that allowed him to leave his hoard and remain intact.
* The astounding witch [[Tasha]] incorporated high-necked collars and ornate necklaces, gorgets, and chokers into many of her fashionable outfits.
